Due being to empowered by [[Strengthening Prescription: Chakra Injection]], [[Gitai]] creates an enhanced version of his [[Earth Release: Hardening Technique]]. Unlike the previous version, the user creates an armour of rock that encases their body with more demonic- looking, extended arms, that are darker in colour. The appearance of the user resembles the rock spider.

[[fr:Doton - Armure de l'Araignée de Roche Démoniaque]]
